p: To assess the immunogenicity of the bivalent OMVs-H1/RBD preparations, female BALB/c mice were immunized with 5 Âµg/mouse of OMVs-H1/RBD and OMVs-empty in comparison with inactivated H1N1pdm2009 and inactivated MERS-CoV as a positive controls and PBS as a negative control. Mice received a booster dose three weeks after prime immunization ( Figure 2a). Sera were collected every two weeks from week two to eight after prime immunization.
